original_title: Walt Disney World 20th Anniversary “The Dream is Alive”
overview: The Dream is Alive, and Walt Disney World is proud of it’s past and excited about the future.  Most of this television special finds us following Michael Eisner, then Disney company President and CEO tracking down celebrities to participate in the celebration.  With Garth Brooks, Amy Grant, Angela Lansbury, Tim Allen, Carol Burnett, Whoopie Goldberg, Goldie Hawn, Billy Joel, Steve Martin, Bette Midler, Eddie Murphy, Dolly Parton, and Robin Williams.
title: Walt Disney World 20th Anniversary “The Dream is Alive”
